funds.description_notes: close $125M debut energy credit fund targeting middle-market lending opportunities in the oil, gas, and energy infrastructure sectors. The first close marks Breakwall Capital's entry into specialized energy credit, positioning it to compete with established players like Magnetite Capital and Midland Loan Services. Fund strategy focuses on senior secured and unitranche debt to energy companies with EBITDA between $25M–$150M, differentiating from larger broadly-syndicated lenders.

articles.summary: Breakwall Capital raises $125m at first close for energy credit fund  Alternative Credit Investor

funds.fund_name: Foresight North West Regional Investment Fund III
funds.description_notes: close £90M for its third regional investment fund targeting mid-market buyouts and growth capital across northwest England, Scotland, and Northern Ireland. The fund maintains Foresight's focus on supporting management-led acquisitions and business expansion in underserved regions outside London, typically deploying £2–8M per portfolio company. FNWRIF III represents a modest increase from its predecessor vintage, underscoring continued investor appetite for regionally diversified UK PE despite macro headwinds.

articles.title: Foresight announces £90m first close of its third North West regional investment fund - Lancashire Business View
articles.summary: Foresight announces £90m first close of its third North West regional investment fund  Lancashire Business View

funds.description_notes: close $262.5m SBIC fund targeting small business lending and debt financing for lower-middle-market companies. The fund leverages SBA-backed Small Business Investment Company licenses to provide flexible capital solutions, complementing traditional bank financing for underserved borrowers. This final close represents Abacus Finance's commitment to the underutilized SBIC channel amid broader credit market dislocation.

articles.title: Abacus Finance closes SBIC fund at $262.5m - Alternative Credit Investor
articles.summary: Abacus Finance closes SBIC fund at $262.5m  Alternative Credit Investor

funds.fund_name: Enko Capital Flagship Private Credit Fund
funds.description_notes: close $100M flagship private credit fund targeting mid-market borrowers across North America with a diversified portfolio of senior secured and unitranche debt. Enko Capital, a credit-focused manager, is anchoring the fund with established LP relationships in the institutional investor base. The final close marks the completion of the firm's core vehicle for deploying capital into sponsors and corporates seeking non-bank financing solutions.

articles.title: Enko Capital raises $100m for flagship private credit fund - Alternative Credit Investor

funds.description_notes: raise €300M for a debut quantum technology fund focused on early-stage companies developing quantum computing hardware, software, and applications across Europe and North America. The first close marks 55 North's entry into the quantum sector, positioning it alongside specialized deep-tech investors betting on the commercialization of quantum technologies. The fund targets founders at the seed and Series A stages, differentiating from larger generalist VCs by concentrating exclusively on quantum's technical and market risks.
